Package it.polimi.demo.network.socket

Class GameListenersSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.demo.network.socket.GameListenersSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener, Serializable, Remote
public class GameListenersSocket extends Object implements Listener, Serializable
This class is used to handle the messages (Listener) that are sent to the client
